scripts.build:staging: env-cmd .env.staging npm run build && npm run cname:staging
scripts.build:production: env-cmd .env.production npm run build && npm run cname:production
scripts.predeploy:production: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ $branch == "master" ]]; then npm run build:production; else echo "Can only run on master"; fi;
scripts.deploy:production: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ $branch == "master" ]]; then gh-pages -d build; else echo "Can only run on master"; fi;
